Discovery Sprints 🏃‍♀️

Apr 21, 2021

  • civictech
  • episode
  • discovery
  • research
  • USDS

This time we talk discovery sprints! We’re joined by Jenn Noinaj and Kathryn Jurick, authors of the United States Digital Service guide to discovery sprints. We’ll chat about what these are, how they’re run, and how they can help.
